Pricing

Ticket Fares

Complete fare information for passengers and vehicles.

Note: Fares are in USD and subject to change. Prices shown are one-way fares. Taxes and port fees may apply. Contact booking office for current rates.

Passenger Fares

Cabin ClassAdult (12+)Child (2-11)Infant (0-2)

Economy Class

Shared cabin (4 berths), basic amenities

$80$50Free

Business Class

Private cabin (2 berths), all meals included

$150$100Free

Premium Suite

Deluxe suite, ocean view, lounge access

$280$180Free

Passenger Fare Notes

  • • Children aged 2-11 years receive discounted fares
  • • Infants under 2 years travel free (no separate berth)
  • • Senior citizens (65+) may be eligible for 10% discount
  • • Group bookings (10+ passengers) may receive special rates
  • • Round-trip bookings receive 10% discount on return fare

Vehicle Transport Fares

Vehicle TypeOne-Way Fare
Motorcycle$40
Small Car (up to 1600cc)$120
Large Car / SUV$180
Van / Minibus$250
Light Commercial Vehicle$350
Pak-Iran Ferry

Official maritime transport service connecting Pakistan and Iran across the Arabian Sea since 2020.

All schedules are subject to change based on weather conditions, regulatory requirements, and operational considerations. Passengers are advised to confirm bookings and verify current travel requirements before departure.
